root.name: Metal Drift
root.description: GameplayMetal Drift is a vehicular sport combat game set in a distant future. As the player, you command an agile, high powered hover tank in a futuristic sports arena. Core game play centers on intense tank-on-tank multiplayer team combat seen through an immersive, first person cockpit. Layered on this is a goal-oriented game type that allows for high level strategy and team dynamics.A selection of weapons become available as the player ranks up in the game.Combat takes place on one of several sports arenas, where two teams (red and blue) have bases on the opposite sides, including goals, in the center of the arena a ball is available, and the teams have to fight over control of the ball and get it to the enemy's goal.
